```{r setup, include=FALSE}

# load libraries
library(knitr)
library(ggplot2)
library(bslib)
library(thematic)

# no need for thematic_knitâ€”bslib in the YAML handles ggplot theming
knitr::opts_chunk$set(
  echo    = FALSE,
  message = FALSE,
  warning = FALSE,
  comment = NA,    # drop the "##" prefix
  fig.width  = 7,
  fig.height = 5
)



```

```{r plots, include=TRUE}
cat(params$class_text)

print(params$prob_plot)

print(params$umap_plot)

```
